definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: overthrow, destruction, only Is 19:18 one shall be called [[עִיר הַהֶרֶס]] city of destruction, i.e. (as usually explained) with punning allusion to On-Heliopolis: it shall be called no longer [[עַיר הַחֶרֶסָ]] city of the sun, but [[עיר חהרסָ]] city of destruction, city whose temples, etc., of the sun have been destroyed; but perh. < LXX po/liv asedek = [[עִיר הֵצֶּדֶק]] city of righteousness, so Gei:Urschrift 79 Brd Di (change intentional ? cf. id.); on other views v. id. & De Che.
